Entries.3601351/F/f Kenny 1500: 50s/52 10/farmer 48 7 1 Kenny 54 5 2/skippable/move farmer 4 0 1/move Kenny 0 2 2/faceDirection Kenny 3/shake Kenny 500/pause 200/emote farmer 8/shake Kenny 500/emote Kenny 32/pause 500/speak Kenny "...@...$3"/shake Kenny 500/message "What happened to you?"/shake Kenny 500/speak Kenny "...Good things only, @...$3"/shake Kenny 500/pause 500/emote farmer 28/shake Kenny 1000/textAboveHead Kenny "ꪮꫝ, ᠻꫀꪖ᥅, ᠻꫀꪖ᥅, ꫝꪮꪶꪗ ᭙ꪮꪊꪀᦔᦓ, ꫝꪮꪶꪗ ᭙ꪮꪊꪀᦔᦓ."/pause 3000/textAboveHead Kenny "꠸ᠻ ꠸ ꠸ꪀᦓ꠸ᦓꪻꫀᦔ, ꠸ ᥴꪮꪊꪶᦔ ꪻꪮꪊᥴꫝ ꠸ꪻ"/shake Kenny 500/pause 3000/textAboveHead Kenny "*giggles*"/pause 3000/emote farmer 28/end

Entries.1202031/F/f Kenny 2000: 50s/5 21/farmer 23 23 3 Kenny 14 23 1/skippable/move Kenny 2 0 1/emote Kenny 16/move farmer -5 0 3/emote farmer 16/pause 200/speak Kenny "Hi, @!"/message "Why were you on my farm?"/pause 500/emote Kenny 40/pause 500/speak Kenny "Well, it's a long story!#$b#So I woke up today feeling a little hungry...#$b#So I went to the caves to get some rocks...#$b#I spoke to Alihaab and ʄཞɛąƙ, and they told me that She will talk to me today!#$b#...Later on...#$b#Aand, I ate. Aand, I had a pretty bad tummy pain..."/message "Get to the point..."/speak Kenny "Right! So SHE told me to go to your farm!#$b#She said that once I will go there, I should come inside your house...#$b#And then let HER take the lead!#$b#She wanted to make sure you 'sleep well'."/emote Kenny 32/emote farmer 28/pause 1000/message "Oh..!"/end
Entries.8916131/F/f Kenny 2500: 50s/5 21/farmer 0 23 1 Kenny 2 23 3/skippable/emote farmer 16/emote Kenny 32/pause 500/speak Kenny "Hi, @!#$b#I was actually on my way to your house! I need to tell you something..."/shake Kenny 500/emote farmer 8/message "Go ahead."/pause 500/speak Kenny "It's just... Hehe...$4#$b#Recently I have this feeling when I'm around you...$4#$b#As if rocks are rolling around my tummy and my skin is burning piece by piece.$4"/pause 500/emote farmer 40/shake Kenny 500/message "Sorry for your inconvienience!"/speak Kenny "But it's not an inconvienience. I want to feel that way all the time.$4#$b#I want to be around you all the time.$4"/shake Kenny 500/pause 200/emote Kenny 20/pause 500/speak Kenny "So... From now on I will be around you at all times.#$b#Sometimes near, sometimes watching from distance...#$b#Look what you've done to me! That must mean we're bestest of friends..."/pause 500/emote farmer 28/pause 500/message "How about I visit you more often, and you don't follow me around at all?"/pause 200/speak Kenny "Awh, but why?$2#$b#But if you promise to visit me more often, I can agree to that...#$b#Just keep your promise. Or you know what will happen.$4"/emote farmer 60/end

Entries.Kenny0: What will the whole 'marriage' thing change in our relationship?$1
Entries.Kenny1: I never had a ceremony for anything, I think...#$b#Oh, wait! I did once have a lot of people gather around me. It happened in a forest.$1#$b#And I was in some circle made from red liquid. Such a fun day!$1#$b#Is it going to be anything like that? Will we be in a circle?
